description: Attack Enemy, Gains Brave
name: Attack
note:
<setup action>

clear battle log
display action
wait: 20
immortal: targets, true
hide battle hud
</setup action>
 
<whole action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'

camera focus: user

zoom: 250%, 20

wait: 20

camera focus: target

zoom: 150%, 20

camera offset: right, 50

camera focus: target

zoom: 150%, 20

camera offset: right, 50

move user: targets, front, 20

else

camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
wait: 40
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
camera offset: right 50

end

motion standby: user

wait for movement

face user: target

</whole action>
 
<target action>

motion attack: user

wait: 10

attack animation: target

wait for animation

action effect
wait:10
show battle hud
</target action>

description:
Consume a fallen friend to regenerate health and grow
stronger.
name: Consume Corpse
note:
<Custom Requirement>
value = $gameParty.deadMembers().length > 0 && $gameParty.deadMembers().some(member => !member.isStateAffected(13));
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Execution>
if($gameParty.deadMembers().filter(member => !member.isStateAffected(13)).length > 0)
{
  $gameParty.deadMembers().filter(member => !member.isStateAffected(13))[0].addState(13);
}
<Custom Execution>

description: Adds Random Effect to Foe
name: Torture
note:
<Pre-Damage Eval>
var rr = Math.floor(Math.random() * 4);//Get a random number
if(rr==0){
target.addState(5);//state ID
}
if(rr==1){
target.addState(6);
}
if(rr==2){
target.addState(8);
}
if(rr==3){
target.addState(9);
}
</Pre-Damage Eval>

damage.formula: var param = [2,3,6][Math.randomInt(3)], turns = 3 + Math.randomInt(3); b.addBuff(param, turns); 20

name: Envigorate
note:
<After Eval>
var buffs = [2,3,4,5,6,7];
var turns = 3;

if (target.isStateAffected(18)) target.setStateCounter(18, target.getStateCounter(18)+1 || 1);
else target.addState(18);

target.addBuff(buffs[Math.floor(Math.random()*buffs.length)], turns);
for (var i = 0; i < target.getStateCounter(18); i++){
  target.addBuff(buffs[Math.floor(Math.random()*buffs.length)], turns);
}
</After Eval>

note:

var debuffs = [2,3,4,5,6,7];
var turns = 3;

if (target.isStateAffected(18)) target.setStateCounter(18, target.getStateCounter(18)+1 || 1);
else target.addState(18);

target.addDebuff(debuffs[Math.floor(Math.random()*debuffs.length)], turns);
for (var i = 0; i < target.getStateCounter(18); i++){
  target.addDebuff(debuffs[Math.floor(Math.random()*debuffs.length)], turns);
}
</After Eval>

description:
Clears all buffs, debuffs, and bindings, does damage/
heals equal to number applied.
name: Unravel
note:
<Target: Everybody>

<After Eval>
// Initialize the HP value.
var hp = 0;
// Loop through all 8 parameters.
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
  // If it is a buff...
  if (target._buffs[i] > 0) {
    // Then increase the damage by a formula.
    hp += user.mdf * 2;
  }
  // If it is a debuff...
  if (target._buffs[i] < 0) {
    // Then increase the healing by a formula.
    hp -= user.mat * 4;
  }
  // Reset the buff to neutral.
  target._buffs[i] = 0;
}
// Check if the HP change is positive...
if (hp > 0) {
  // Play an animation.
  target.startAnimation(41);
// Check if the HP change is negative...
} else if (hp < 0) {
  // Play an animation.
  target.startAnimation(56);
}
// Check if the HP amount isn't 0...
if (hp !== 0) {
  // Alter the target's HP.
  target.gainHp(hp);
  // Start the damage popup for the target.
  target.startDamagePopup();
  if (target.isStateAffected(3) && hp < 0) {
  $gameVariables.setValue(13, $gameVariables.value(13) + (-1 * hp));
  }
}
// Clear the target's results.

target.clearResult();
</After Eval>

name: Guardian Sheild

name: Command - Overide
note:
<Before Eval>
// Initialize the HP value.
var hp = 0;

// Loop through all 8 parameters.
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
 
  // If it is a debuff...
  if (user._buffs[i] < 0) {
    // Then increase the healing by a formula.
    hp += user.mat * 4;
    $gameVariables.setValue(25, $gameVariables.value(25) + 1);
  }
  // Reset the buff to neutral.
  user._buffs[i] = 0;
}
// Check if the HP change is positive...
if (hp > 0) {
  // Play an animation.
  user.startAnimation(41);
// Check if the HP change is negative...
} else if (hp < 0) {
  // Play an animation.
  user.startAnimation(56);
}
// Check if the HP amount isn't 0...
if (hp !== 0) {
  // Alter the target's HP.
 user.gainHp(hp);
  // Start the damage popup for the target.
 user.startDamagePopup();
}

// Clear the target's results.

user.clearResult();
</Before Eval>

note:

var debuffs = [2,3,4,5,6,7];
var turns = 2;

for (var i = 0; i < $gameVariables.value(25); i++){
  target.addDebuff(debuffs[Math.floor(Math.random()*debuffs.length)], turns);
}
$gameVariables.setValue(25, 0);
